entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/comp_status
entry.label: Component status:
entry.help_brief: component status {Enabled; Disabled}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/in_directory
entry.label: Input directory:
entry.help_brief: input directory

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/out_directory
entry.label: Output directory:
entry.help_brief: output directory

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/site_prefix
entry.label: Site prefix:
entry.help_brief: file prefix for the study site

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/case_prefix
entry.label: Case prefix:
entry.help_brief: file prefix for the model scenario

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/n_steps
entry.label: Number of steps:
entry.help_brief: number of time steps

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/dt
entry.label: Time step:
entry.help_brief: process timestep [sec]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/DEM_file
entry.label: DEM filename:
entry.help_brief: filename of binary file with DEM

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/A_units
entry.label: Area grid units:
entry.help_brief: area grid units, m^2 or km^2

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/LINK_FLATS
entry.label: LINK_FLATS toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to link flats, 0 or 1

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/FILL_PITS_IN_Z0
entry.label: FILL_PITS_IN_Z0 toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to fill pits in original DEM, 0 or 1

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/LR_PERIODIC
entry.label: LR_PERIODIC toggle:
entry.help_brief: B.C., periodic in left-right direction, 0 or 1

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/TB_PERIODIC
entry.label: TB_PERIODIC toggle:
entry.help_brief: B.C., periodic in top-bottom direction, 0 or 1

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/save_grid_dt
entry.label: Save grid timestep:
entry.help_brief: time interval between saved grids [sec]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_AREA_GRIDS
entry.label: Save A grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save grids of D8 area {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/area_gs_file
entry.label: Save A grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for grid stack of D8 area [km^2]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_CODE_GRIDS
entry.label: Save D8 grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save grids of D8 codes {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/code_gs_file
entry.label: Save D8 grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for grid stack of D8 codes

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_DS_GRIDS
entry.label: Save ds grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save grids of ds {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/ds_gs_file
entry.label: Save ds grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for grid stack of ds [m]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_DW_GRIDS
entry.label: Save dw grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save grids of dw {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/dw_gs_file
entry.label: Save dw grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for grid stack of dw [m]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/save_pixels_dt
entry.label: Save pixels timestep:
entry.help_brief: time interval between time series values [sec]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/pixel_file
entry.label: Monitored pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for monitored pixel info

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_AREA_PIXELS
entry.label: Save A pixels toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save time series of D8 area {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/area_ts_file
entry.label: Save A pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for time series of D8 area [m]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_CODE_PIXELS
entry.label: Save D8 pixels toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save time series of D8 codes {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/code_ts_file
entry.label: Save D8 pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for time series of D8 codes

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_DS_PIXELS
entry.label: Save ds pixels toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save time series of ds {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/ds_ts_file
entry.label: Save ds pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for time series of ds [m]

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/SAVE_DW_PIXELS
entry.label: Save dw pixels toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save time series of dw {Yes; No}

entry.name: /D8Local/Input/Var/dw_ts_file
entry.label: Save dw pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for time series of dw [m]

entry.name: /D8Local/ModelName
entry.label: Model name:
entry.help_brief: Name of the model

entry.name: /D8Local/ModelAuthor
entry.label: Author name:
entry.help_brief: Name of the model author

entry.label: HTML help file:
